TEXT.TITLE: SJNB <SJNB> SAYS CHIEF EXECUTIVE RESIGNS
TEXT.BODY: SJNB Financial Corp said Douglas McLendon has resigned as president and chief executive officer of the holding company and its San Jose National Bank subsidiary and as a director of its Tri-Valley National Bank subsidiary to pursue other interests. It said vice chairman William Pfeifle, 68, will act as interim president and chjief executive officer. Reuter
